response.raw:
Here is the memo wrapped in the requested tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO: Customer Service Representative Responsibilities

As a senior Customer Service Representative, your primary responsibilities are to:

• Communicate with customers via phone and in-person to provide excellent customer service
• Share detailed information about the company's products and service offerings
• Process customer orders and enter them into the order management system 
• Handle requests to cancel customer accounts per the company's cancellation policies
• Gather information about customer issues and complaints, working to understand the details
• Attempt to resolve customer complaints and issues to the customer's satisfaction
• Escalate complex customer problems to a supervisor or manager when needed
• Maintain a professional, courteous, and empathetic demeanor with customers at all times

By executing these duties diligently, you will play a vital role in ensuring high customer satisfaction and retention. Please let me know if you have any other questions.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
